channel.title: Image on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Image on PR

item.title: RIP - Steven P. Jobs
item.description: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.

item.title: Idea to action: Tile this
item.description: Not many of my ideas are converted to a project, this one has seen its light last week. Though I haven’t completed all the UI and features of my original vision, it is better to have one working idea than nothing.

item.title: Wallpaper - Testflight app
item.description: I really liked the background image pattern used in testflightapp.com. It is so cool that I have replaced my all time favorite iPad-Safari-fabric texture to gray varient given below.

item.title: Radio buttons and Checkboxes
item.description:
I have designed the following as one of my side project required a simple radio buttons and checkboxes.

Download the *.png files.

item.title: We are the Champions
item.description: After all the hiccups over years, we were able to witness the ultimate glory of bring back the cup to India after 28 years. India is a nation with at-least 50 million cricket experts including me. Though I’m not a professional player or an expert I do have rights to talk (who cares anyway)

item.title: iPad wallpaper for minimalist
item.description:
Here is the background image I am using for my iPad. It is looking gorgeous on Home screen.

Looks good on both orientations.
